Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Ryan C
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights trip rome dont listen complaints holes walls bad bathrooms terrible mattresses didnt holes walls bathrooms shower leak floor hot water everytime showered sink corner handy decorated bland goes rome hang hotel anyway location blocks train station cleaned everyday beds comfy hotel replacing mattresses halfway stay staff amazing particularly owner hotel accomodating available front desk advice traveling naples definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent for price”
Reviews.Author: Rachael K
Reviews.Content: friend students uk stayed 3 day trip rome october found location excellent close main station trevi fountain pantheon bus walking distance staff hotel friendly feel welcome shared bathrooms clean neither wait construction peaceful nights sleep provided hair dryer extra pillows blankets free wifi laptop accessible people didnt own hotel convenient stay trip rome

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location But That's About IT.”
Reviews.Author: capricietto
Reviews.Content: im college student looking budget deals wasnt expecting 5 star service nor amazingly beautiful hotel rome week traveling girlfriends location hotel texas superb 5 min walk trevi fountain 5 mins pantheon staff host understanding helpful oh free wifi downsides cold shower water hotel inconsistently functioning water system forcing showering 3 days eventually fixed construction noise hammering drilling dont slept nights woken morning 730am sort remodeling project cold heaters dont february isnt particularly cold month mid 50s 1012 told rome 12 hour rule heaters 12 hours day freezing night hair dryers picky website provide hair dryers neglected shared bathroom dorm life issue sharing bathroom toilet water didnt flush overall unpleasant experience own sink slightly convenient stay complained owner trouble staying agreed discount inconveniences plus students budget hotel manager soul recommend hotel whos looking location cost expectations
